name: BuranCasino

verdict.text: BuranCasino presents a complex picture.  While older reviews mention a Curacao license, extensive game selection, and convenient website, its current status is uncertain. The available information, primarily bonus codes and promotions, appears outdated as of December 9th, 2024, suggesting the casino might be inactive or rebranded.  This makes a definitive assessment difficult. Potential players should exercise extreme caution and verify the casino's operational status and licensing before engaging.  Given the lack of current information, I cannot recommend BuranCasino at this time. For players seeking a reliable online casino experience, I recommend exploring well-established platforms with transparent licensing and up-to-date information. For further details, visit http://burancasino.com.
